line_1: As We shall show at large hereafter.
line_2: Gives Pain or Pleasure, Grief or Laughter;

line_1: And both to be better prepar'd for herea'ter,
line_2: Take a Smack of the Brimstone contain'd in the Water.

line_1: By fears of what may come hereafter?
line_2: Forbidding short liv'd mirth and laughter
